text: He imanavalaharu! Jaba timiharumadhye kasaiko mrtyu najika a'ipugcha ra vasiyata (icchapatra) garda dharmika svabhava bha'ekamadhye du'ijana manisaharula'i saksi rakha, va timiharu baheka aru du'i janala'i yadi timi yatra garirakheka chau ra timro mrtyu najika a'ipugcha bhane ti duvaila'i sankako samaya namaja pachi rokera allahako sapatha khuva'unu ki tiniharule saksyako badala kunai sansarika labha line chainan, yadyapi kohi najikako natedara nai kina nahos ra tinale allahako kurala'i luka'une pani chainan. Yadi yasto gare bhane thulo papi hunechan
